duties_responsibilities.duty: Successfully source, screen interview, evaluate and hire qualified candidates
Consult and strategize with Hiring Managers/Partners on developing and executing hiring strategies
Network through industry contacts, association memberships, past candidates and current employees
Work closely with sourcing team to identify new avenues to attract talent
Accurately report and track candidate data
Participate in special projects/task forces as assigned
Solid direct sourcing / cold call experience
The ability to interact effectively with all levels of professionals

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Human Resources, Business, or a related field (Master's preferred)
